title: Snow on Janet's driveway part - a

content.description:
There is no snow on Janet's driveway when snow begins to fall at midnight. From midnight to 9 A.M., snow accumulates on the driveway at a rate modeled by f(t) = 7tecos t cubic feet per hour, where t is measured in hours since midnight. Janet starts removing snow at 6 A.M. (t = 6). The rate g(t), in cubic feet per hour, at which Janet removes snow from the driveway at time t hours after midnight is modeled by
<math> <mrow> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mrow> <mo>{</mo> <mrow> <mtable> <mtr> <mtd> <mn>0</mn> </mtd> </mtr> <mtr> <mtd> <mrow> <mn>125</mn> </mrow> </mtd> </mtr> <mtr> <mtd> <mrow> <mn>108</mn> </mrow> </mtd> </mtr> </mtable> </mrow> </mrow> <mtext> </mtext> <mtext> </mtext> <mtext> </mtext> <mtext> </mtext> <mtable> <mtr> <mtd> <mrow> <mtext>for </mtext> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo><</mo> <mn>6</mn> </mrow> </mtd> </mtr> <mtr> <mtd> <mrow> <mtext>for </mtext> <mn>6</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo><</mo> <mn>7</mn> </mrow> </mtd> </mtr> <mtr> <mtd> <mrow> <mtext> </mtext> <mtext> </mtext> <mtext>for </mtext> <mn>7</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>9.</mn> </mrow> </mtd> </mtr> </mtable> </mrow> </math>
content.question: How many cubic feet of snow have accumulated on the driveway by 6 A.M?
